title: "Landmark recommendations on development of artificial intelligence and the future of global health"
excerpt: "A landmark review of the role of artificial intelligence (AI) in the future of global health calls on the global health community to establish guidelines for development and deployment of new technologies and to develop a human-centered research agenda to facilitate equitable and ethical use of AI."
